com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.inventory

Class CraftInputSlot

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.inventory.CraftInputSlot

  • public class CraftInputSlot
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents all the information stored for a particular input slot of a crafting recipe. For example, the possible items that match can be queried.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CraftInputSlot(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack[] choices)

    • Method Detail

      • getChoices

        public org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack[] getChoices()
        Gets all possible items that match for this input slot
        Returns:
        matched item choices

      • getDefaultChoice

        public org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack getDefaultChoice()
        Gets the first choice from the available choices. Will always return non-null.
        Returns:
        default choice

      • match

        public org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack match(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack item)
        Checks if an item matches one of the choices of this input slot. If this input slot defines a durability, that must match as well. When a match is found, the matched item is returned. Otherwise, null is returned.
        Parameters:
        item - to match
        Returns:
        matched item, or null if no choice was matched

      • clone

        public CraftInputSlot clone()
        Overrides:

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object

      • tryMergeWith

        public CraftInputSlot tryMergeWith(CraftInputSlot other)
        Attempts to merge the input choices from this input slot with another. If either slots are multiple-choice or differ in inputs, this returns null.
        Parameters:
        other -
        Returns:
        merged input slot, or null if not mergable
